channel.title: [Glitch] Elevator stuck
channel.description:
I can't remember which chapter this is. There's a part where you get into an elevator, it stops and drops you into radioactive sludge. When the elevator dropped me, I landed in the sludge and lost some health. After that, I some how managed to get stuck underneath the sludge. I was forced to load a save point.
[img]https://img211.imageshack.us/img211/1113/bmc1a4d0000.jpg[/img]
